title: Wild and Crazy: Photos from the Comedy Wildlife Photography Awards
description: The funniest photographs of wildlife from around the world collected here in one must-have book that is perfect for animal lovers of all stripes.When the Comedy Wildlife Photography Awards announced a contest for the funniest animal photo, they received entries from all over the world. Now authors and original award founders Paul Joynson-Hicks and Tom Sullam showcase the best of the best—as well as some never before seen—to present the most joyful photographs of wildlife ever printed.A pelican losing its lunch; an elephant falling on its face; a meerkat having a rough day… You’ll love this light-hearted, upbeat The images will make you smile, but there’s a serious side to this the authors hope to raise awareness for the need to protect wildlife, and the habitats they call home.
author: Paul Joynson-Hicks
